interview process to a maximum of two to four somewhere within that range and always tell your candidates what the

you want it to be relevant for the role so if it's a developer role then you want it to be obviously coding questions

reports nothing on your own so one of the first things that I did was work

part of that leadership group were empowered to own and drive initiatives and bring in people from the wider team
to run and drive initiatives with that team we were able to have 15% growth and
a 95 percent retention rate so empowering people makes your life a lot
